entities.name: quirrell
entities.description: Quirrell is a teacher in Harry's classroom who has a turban and claims to have fought off a zombie.

entities.name: seamus finnigan
entities.description: Seamus Finnigan is a student in Quirrell's class who asks about the zombie story

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a student in Quirrell's class who finds out he's not behind everyone else in learning magic

entities.name: african prince
entities.description: An African prince gave Quirrell the turban as a thank-you for getting rid of a zombie

entities.name: zombie
entities.description: A zombie that Quirrell claims to have fought off and was given thanks by an African prince

entities.name: vampire
entities.description: A vampire from Romania that Quirrell is afraid will come back for him

relationships.description: Quirrell received the turban from an African prince as a thank-you for getting rid of a zombie
Quirrell claims to have fought off and defeated the zombie
Quirrell is afraid that the vampire from Romania will come back for him
